abstract: American Electric Power is planning the largest demonstration yet of capturing carbon dioxide from a coal-fired power plant and pumping it deep underground.
snippet: American Electric Power is planning the largest demonstration yet of capturing carbon dioxide from a coal-fired power plant and pumping it deep underground.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 14 — American Electric Power, a major electric utility, is planning the largest demonstration yet of capturing carbon dioxide from a coal-fired power plant and pumping it deep underground.

headline.main: In a Test of Capturing Carbon Dioxide, Perhaps a Way to Temper Global Warming
headline.print_headline: In a Test of Capturing Carbon Dioxide, Perhaps a Way to Temper Global Warming
